sentences.en: Everyone conveniently overlooked the aircraft stationed in South Korea.
sentences.cn: 为了避免麻烦,大家都不提驻在南朝鲜的空军.

sentences.en: Her chum said that South Korea is a scary place.
sentences.cn: 她的朋友说南韩是个疯狂的地方.

sentences.en: I left Korea impressed by the courage and endurance of its people.
sentences.cn: 我离开朝鲜时,心中念念不忘它的人民的勇敢和坚毅精神.

sentences.en: In South Korea, plastic surgery do not need people in the hospital.
sentences.cn: 在韩国, 做整形美容手术并不需要进医院.

sentences.en: It has called the typhoon the worst natural disaster in South Korea in many years.
sentences.cn: 它称这次台风为韩国多年来最严重的自然灾害。

sentences.en: Korea and China are separated by only the Yalu River.
sentences.cn: 朝鲜和中国只隔一条鸭绿江.

sentences.en: Korea lies (to the) west of Japan.
Korea lies to the east of China.
Korea plutocrat is the prime cause that causes financial crisis to erupt.
sentences.cn: 韩国财阀是导致金融危机爆发的根本原因。

sentences.en: North Korea has threatened to test-fire an intercontinental ballistic missile .
sentences.cn: 朝鲜已威胁要试射一枚洲际弹道导弹。

sentences.en: She had a very jolly time in Korea.
She travels to Korea on Monday.
South Korea's imports of consumer products jumped 33% in this year.
sentences.cn: 今年，韩国消费产品的进口激增了33%。

sentences.en: South Korea's Unification Ministry called the North Korean decision regrettable.
sentences.cn: 南韩统一部称北朝鲜的决议是让人遗憾的.

sentences.en: The border between China and Korea has been formally delimited.
sentences.cn: 中国与朝鲜的边界已正式划定了.

sentences.en: Why did you have to come to our town to turn it into North Korea?
sentences.cn: 为什么你要来我们镇把这里变成朝鲜?
